services.name: elasticsearch
services.description: Elasticsearch instances provisioned via Aiven. (Elasticsearch 5.x plans are deprecated and will be removed on 2019/04/16.)

plans.name: tiny-5.x
plans.description: [DEPRECATED] NOT Highly Available, 1 dedicated VM, 1 CPU per VM, 4GB RAM per VM, 80GB disk space.

metadata.displayName: [DEPRECATED] Tiny, NOT Highly Available single-node Elasticsearch 5 cluster

plans.name: tiny-6.x
plans.description: NOT Highly Available, 1 dedicated VM, 1 CPU per VM, 4GB RAM per VM, 80GB disk space.

metadata.displayName: Tiny, NOT Highly Available single-node Elasticsearch 6 cluster

plans.name: small-ha-5.x
plans.description: [DEPRECATED] 3 dedicated VMs, 1 CPU per VM, 4GB RAM per VM, 240GB disk space.

plans.name: small-ha-6.x
plans.description: 3 dedicated VMs, 1 CPU per VM, 4GB RAM per VM, 240GB disk space.

plans.name: medium-ha-5.x
plans.description: [DEPRECATED] 3 dedicated VMs, 2 CPU per VM, 8GB RAM per VM, 525GB disk space.

plans.name: medium-ha-6.x
plans.description: 3 dedicated VMs, 2 CPU per VM, 8GB RAM per VM, 525GB disk space.

plans.name: large-ha-6.x
plans.description: 3 dedicated VMs, 2 CPU per VM, 15GB RAM per VM, 1050GB disk space.
